name: Baldi Basics Trap Out Of Control Created By TheWizardRoyal
name_original: Baldi Basics Trap Out Of Control Created By TheWizardRoyal
description:
Oh no!. Baldi is trapped! what happened was a trap! there are very weapons that are DANGER. Who killed the baldi? well it's the secret of ending for Play Dancing Line Minigame to win!. baldi has died take it to ambulance then at the graveyard the sad ending for all correct answers.
WHO KILLED BALDI?
Version 1.2.1
Secret ending. but must Press Hold W + Shift Continue until the trigger is more than 10 seconds. after there is a scary sound DON'T MOVE THE MOUSE YOU FAIL
You can follow music beat to play dancing line to win Secret Ending
Sad Playtime because baldi dead.
Gotta Sweep speed so fast! like super fast edition
